title: AI helps scam centers evade crackdown in Asia and dupe more victims
description: Rather than be eradicated, Interpol officials see scam centers as more likely to evolve as artificial intelligence allows operators to scale up at low cost.
content:
Criminals in Southeast Asia are harnessing inexpensive artificial intelligence tools to target bigger pools of potential victims at high speed, keeping scam centers humming even as governments try and crack down, senior officials at Interpol say.

title: Amazon discusses AI content marketplace with publishers, The Information reports
description: Amazon has signaled to publishing industry executives that it is planning to launch a marketplace where publishers can sell their content to firms offering artificial intelligence products, The Information reported on Monday.
content:
Ahead of an Amazon Web Services conference on Tuesday, AWS has circulated slides that mention a content marketplace, the report said, citing two people who spoke with Amazon about the project.

title: Majority of young Brits worried about sexual deepfakes being made of them using AI
description: The new findings come after 12 per cent of teenagers aged between 13 and 17 say they have already seen people their age use artificial intelligence (AI) to create sexual images of others
content:
By Chay Quinn
More than half of teenage children are worried about AI being used to make sexual deepfakes of them, a new poll has found.

title: Switchbot AI Art Frame review: E-paper meets artificial intelligence
description: The Switchbot AI Art Frame lets you use artificial intelligence to create images for this E Paper display, but it’s not enough to elevate it over other digital photo frames.
